"Oh, I can't believe it work oh I'm so big !" Goten said with Chichi voice.

"Oh no.." Chichi said now with Goten little boy voice.

She was now in Goten body's.

"Give me back my body now your father comes home today !"

"Well no, you don't have any power now go to your room" Goten said demanding.

"B-but.."

"Go to your room NOW! Goten yelled.

Chichi felt fear at her own voice

"O-ok." She walked to his new room.

"That’s was so freaking amazing Trunks ! But what am I going to do dad coming home what should I do ?" Goten said.
